Sentece: Butalbital is a small molecule (approximately 220 Da), with 26% protein binding, a 0.8 L/kg volume of distribution, and is eliminated nearly 80% unchanged in the urine.
Title: Extracorporeal elimination of butalbital in acute aspirin-butalbital-caffeine-codeine (Fiorinal with Codeine) poisoning.
Name: Butalbital

Sentece: Her presentation was notable for a decline in mental status, preserved renal function and a relatively low peak salicylate concentration at 46.4 mg/dL (3.4 mmol/L).
Title: Extracorporeal elimination of butalbital in acute aspirin-butalbital-caffeine-codeine (Fiorinal with Codeine) poisoning.

Title: Extracorporeal elimination of butalbital in acute aspirin-butalbital-caffeine-codeine (Fiorinal with Codeine) poisoning.
Name: Butalbital

Sentece: At the end of a four-hour hemodialysis session, the total body elimination of butalbital was approximately 60% which corresponded to an intradialytic clearance of 233-300 mL/min.
Title: Extracorporeal elimination of butalbital in acute aspirin-butalbital-caffeine-codeine (Fiorinal with Codeine) poisoning.
